h3_39: University of Arkansas for Medical Sciences (UAMS) College of Medicine
span_48: University of Arkansas For Medical Sciences
p_64: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).
h3_68: # of Filled Resident Positions, by Year*
p_83: *Totals may vary from year to year due to off-cycle residents.
th_101: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_104: Our large volume of imaging studies, wide variety of pathology, well equipped training facilities and faculty committed to resident education make this training program an exceptional educational opportunity for residents. Our program is a 5-year categorical program that includes an integrated clinical year followed by 4 years of diagnostic radiology training. Diversity of workforce and emphasis on resident wellness are the other strengths of our program.

p_356: The race/ethnicity data are shown alone or in combination with other race/ethnicity responses. Because some individuals may report multiple races/ethnicities, the totals may not equal 100%. Only residents who are U.S. citizens or permanent residents are included in race/ethnicity counts.
